title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Mobile Microlearning for Power Electronics Design Capability Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners will analyze core parameters of power conversion systems (switching frequency, efficiency, etc.)
Learners will diagnose circuit design errors in real-time with over 80% accuracy through clicker-based formative assessments
Learners will develop competency in designing three types of power electronics circuits (inverter, converter, rectifier) within four weeks in mobile learning environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
